main event: A witness reported observing a single unidentified object in La Puente, California on March 13, 1962.
interesting points: The object exhibited rapid erratic movements and sudden changes in flight patterns., It had four pulsing lights in different positions., The witness classified the object as possibly being a type of unusual aircraft that they could not identify., Weather conditions at the time of the sighting were not specified., The sighting lasted for approximately 5 minutes.
witness description: A 15-year-old male, senior in high school
